medical_history.chief_complaint: Right lower quadrant pain, nausea, and vomiting.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Patient started experiencing diffuse abdominal pain that localized to the right lower quadrant (RLQ) last night. She had notable non-bilious, non-bloody vomiting once last night associated with nausea. There have been no fevers or chills. The patient denies constipation but has a history of diarrhea, currently being worked up by gastroenterology.
medical_history.past_medical_history: History of colon cancer status post left colectomy; no history of Crohn's or ulcerative colitis. Last colonoscopy showed multiple polyps.
